review_text: The fabric is great quality and the color is vibrant. Fits well.
Looks beautiful, but the stitching is bad on the sleeves. Tore easily after one wash.
Fast delivery! The material feels very good for the price.
Color faded after the first wash. Looks different from the picture. Very disappointed.
The material is very cheap. Not worth the money.
Received the wrong size, it was too small. The return process was okay.
Excellent material and perfect fit for my bed. Looks great!
Delivery was on time and the product is exactly as described.
